column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=My friend and I took the bus last week to the mall .
#id=2
#text=This was a fun trip that last for a few hours back and forth .
#id=3
#text=In the morning we got up early to wait outside the bus stop near our houses .
#id=4
#text=When the bus came on time we got on board and paid for our tickets through the machine .
#id=5
#text=My friend swiped his bus card and I paid in cash .
#id=6
#text=After we got on we both went to the back where there were two empty seats .
#id=7
#text=After stopping at 5 stops we transferred buses at the local station .
#id=8
#text=This would allow us to take the right route to the mall .
#id=9
#text=After coming back from the mall we took the same bus .
#text=There were a lot more people in the afternoon .
#text=At one point there were no seats left and two old ladies got on board .
#text=My friend an I decided to be polite and gave them our seats while we stood .
#text=Overall it was a great experience being able to ride the bus and help others at the same time .
